truenas.name: truenas-control-app
truenas.description: Control TrueNAS apps - start, stop, or restart. Parameters: app_name (required, string - the app name like 'radarr' or 'jellyfin'), action (required, string - 'start', 'stop', or 'restart')
truenas.author: cmac86

truenas.name: truenas-get-status
truenas.description: Get TrueNAS system status including CPU, memory, storage pools, and running apps
truenas.author: cmac86

google calendar.name: calendar-get-events
google calendar.description: Get calendar events. Parameters: start_date and end_date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Note: end_date is EXCLUSIVE, so to get events for a single day, set end_date to the NEXT day. Example: for January 16th events, use start_date=2026-01-16, end_date=2026-01-17.
google calendar.author: cmac86
